title: Slow Cooker Bacon-Wrapped Apple BBQ Chicken
directions: In a medium bowl, combine BBQ sauce, brown sugar, lemon juice and peeled/chopped apples.
Wrap each piece of chicken with two slices of bacon and place in a greased slow cooker.
Pour BBQ/apple mixture over chicken and cook on low for about 6-8 hours or until chicken is done.
ingredients: 1 cup BBQ sauce (I used Sweet Baby Ray's)
5 small apples, peeled and chopped (I used gala)
